verses.verse: A Song; a Psalm of the sons of Korah. <S%H1419>Great<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>, In the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in <S%H5131>elevation<s%>, the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>, Is <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, on the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, The <S%H7151>city<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> hath made himself <S%H3045>known<s%> in her <S%H759>palaces<s%> for a <S%H4869>refuge<s%>.
For <S%H4428><s%>, lo, the kings <S%H3259>assembled<s%> <S%H5674>themselves<s%>, They passed by <S%H3162>together<s%>.
They <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8539>it<s%>, then were they amazed; They were <S%H926>dismayed<s%>, they hasted <S%H2648>away<s%>.
Trembling <S%H7461><s%> took <S%H270>hold<s%> of them <S%H2427>there<s%>, Pain, as of a woman in <S%H2427>travail<s%>.

As we have <S%H8085>heard<s%>, so have we <S%H7200>seen<s%> In the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3559>establish<s%> it <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
We have <S%H1819>thought<s%> on thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, In the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thy <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

As is thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, So is thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> unto the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: Thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.
Let <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%>, Let the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, Because of thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
Walk <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and go round <S%H5362>about<s%> <S%H5608>her<s%>; Number the towers <S%H4026>thereof<s%>;
480 <S%H7896><s%> ye <S%H3820>well<s%> her <S%H2430>bulwarks<s%>; <S%H6448>Consider<s%> her <S%H759>palaces<s%>: That ye may <S%H5608>tell<s%> it to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H314>following<s%>.
For this <S%H430>God<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>: He will be our <S%H5090>guide<s%> even unto <S%H4192>death<s%>.
